title: Is this a bannable offense (Had to move content??)
body: So I am looking around and started discovering ways to bind attack move to the right click of the mouse, however it does use third party programs to actually enable the ability to rebind the right mouse button. My question before I made any sort of attempt is would this be considered a bannable offense, and no offense meant but I won't consider any answer official unless it is from a rioter

replies.body: Hmm, not around a comp to check but cant you just remap the attack/move key in client and avoid this issue entirely?
You can do that with every key EXCEPT right mouse click, Weird right?
Interesting.  You can rebind left mouse then?  That might be a passable alternative if you dont mind the learning curve.
